message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price that I think is fair. I'm offering the product to you for $1100000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you've placed on it.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value the product holds for you.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1075000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value the product holds for you, and it's still a good deal for you compared to the original price I mentioned.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I understand that you're trying to find a good price for the product. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $1000000. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product, and it's getting close to the original price you mentioned.

I understand that you're trying to find a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $975000. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1050000, which is the same price I offered in round 3. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value the product holds for you, and it's the highest price you've been willing to consider so far.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand that you're trying to find a good price for the product. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $1000000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $990000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product, and it's the highest price I'm willing to consider.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $990000. Considering the value the product holds for you, I'm willing to make one last counteroffer. I'm offering the product to you for $1075000, which is the same price I offered in round 5. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
